title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, goals, and requirements. Conduct stakeholder interviews and market research to understand user needs and preferences.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, and integration points.

title: Database Design
description: Design the database schema to store mentor profiles, skills, and mentee information.

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interface for mentors to create profiles, showcase skills, and for mentees to search and connect with mentors.

title: Backend Development
description: Implement the server-side logic, including authentication, profile management, search functionality, and mentor-mentee matching.

title: Security and Access Control
description: Implement appropriate security measures, including authentication, authorization, and data protection mechanisms. Ensure compliance with industry standards and best practices for handling sensitive user data and financial transactions.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute test plans for functional, integration, and performance testing. Ensure high code quality and user experience.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment pipeline, infrastructure, and monitoring for the application.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation for developers, administrators, and end-users.
